item.description:
Saturday night dancing and music is back at Scholar's in the Downtown Crossing area.

I've heard great things about this place and encourage you to check it out online.

This place has everything from gourmet food, to wine, to micro brewed beers to pool tables to a live DJ.

I've never been here but have gotten such great reviews, we gotta check it!

DRESS CODE: There is a slight dress code. Click here. No athletic apparel and "dress to impress"

COVER: The cover is at 9pm and is $5. I plan on getting there for 7pm where we can chill, throw a few back and mingle.

LINE: I do not know if lines form, but I assume they would seeing as it's downtown crossing on a Saturday night.

CHECK THIS SITE BEFORE YOU LEAVE YOUR HOUSE AS I MIGHT HAVE TO CHANGE VENUES!!!!

DATING: This is not a dating event - this is a social event centered around dancing and mingling.

RENTING SPACE: I was given the option of renting our own area. This might cost you a few dollars and we may have to pool our funds. Is this something you would be interested in? If so, post a comment or shoot me an email. Unless I see an interest, we'll just chill at the bar.

INFORMATION: I've never been here, so if anyone has any advice or info please let me know.

FACEBOOK: Copy and paste this as an event on your FB and invite your buddies. The more the merrier.

DOUBLE BOOKING: Only RSVP to one site so I can have a correct head count (I'm posting this on Social Fun, Fun with Alcohol, and Boston Happy Hour)
item.name: Saturday Night Social: DJ and Dancing
